/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the overcast sky and the greenery in the background.
